snippet: The aircraft maker says it will increase monthly production of its highly profitable, top-selling 737 jets to 47 from 38 by 2017.
abstract: Boeing, riding surge of demand for new fuel-efficient planes, announces that it will increase production of its top-selling 737 jets to 47 a month by 2017.
lead_paragraph: The aircraft maker says it will increase monthly production of its highly profitable, top-selling 737 jets to 47 from 38 by 2017.

headline.main: Boeing Says It Will Raise Production of the 737
headline.print_headline: Boeing Says It Will Raise Production Of the 737
